alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 6:51PM CDT until April 02 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Marion County in northeastern Texas... Eastern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 650 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Woodlawn to near Marshall to 7 miles east of Hallsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Marshall, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Jefferson, Oil City, Mooringsport, Belcher, Gilliam, Karnack, Woodlawn, Gray, Scottsville, Uncertain, Dixie, Nesbitt, Caddo Lake, Cross Lake and Cavett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
